title: Corinthia St. Petersburg announces record-breaking room revenue for June 2015
text:
Corinthia St. Petersburg announces record-breaking room revenue for June 2015 Adv: Corinthia St. Petersburg facade Adv: 
ST. PETERSBURG, Russia - Corinthia St. Petersburg announces record-breaking room revenue for June 2015, noting an impressive 5.7% increase on the hotel’s previous highest monthly room revenue, which was recorded in 2013. 
The five-star hotel, located on the famous Nevsky Prospect, attributes this rise in bookings to a series of recently-implemented key strategies, which prioritize a strong focus on online marketing and cooperation with online travel agents (OTA’s), as well as broadening the countries from which guests originate. 
Online Strategy 
Corinthia St. Petersburg’s online business continues to grow month on month, and will remain a key focal point in the hotel business, with an increase of 26% on 2014 and 65% on 2013. The Russian population is becoming increasingly tech savvy, resulting in an increase in online bookings from the domestic market. The Russian market remains an important source of revenue for the hotel, which has huge appeal to those seeking grand-style accommodation in the heart of this famous city. The growth in revenue was also supported by the hotel’s efforts to integrate further into the local culture in St. Petersburg, by supporting the city’s sports and arts, including the FC Zenit, winners of the Russian Premier League. 
Corinthia St. Petersburg recorded an outstanding customer satisfaction score of 92.4%, an endorsement of Corinthia’s emphasis on the passionate and precise delivery of great service. Source: Corinthia Hotels
